akn:section.akn:heading: Biennial survey of economic and housing market conditions

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1701z–10a. Biennial survey of economic and housing market conditions The Secretary shall, not less than biennially, survey national, regional, and local economic and housing market conditions in a manner that provides data comparable to the data collected in such survey conducted in 1981. (Pub. L. 91–609, title V, § 512, as added Pub. L. 98–181, title I [title IV, § 466(b)], Nov. 30, 1983, 97 Stat. 1236.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was enacted as part of the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1970, and not as part of the National Housing Act which comprises this chapter.
